import numpy as np # linear algebra
import pandas as pd # data processing, CSV file I/O (e.g. pd.read_csv)

# Input data files are available in the read-only "../input/" directory
# For example, running this (by clicking run or pressing Shift+Enter) will list all files under the input directory

import os
for dirname, _, filenames in os.walk('/kaggle/input'):
    for filename in filenames:
        print(os.path.join(dirname, filename))

source.20358ef6:
# 5. Moda de los cualit, media de los cuant

import scipy
from scipy import stats 

modacual=list()
mediacuan=list()

for i in cualitativos:
    modacual.append(stats.mode(df[i]))
for i in cuantitativos:
    mediacuan.append(np.mean(df[i]))
    
print(modacual)
print(mediacuan)
source.793dab47:
# 6. Rango, varianza, desviación estandar para los cuantitativos

rango=list()
varianza=list()
desv=list()

for i in cuantitativos:
    rango.append(np.max(df[i])-np.min(df[i]))
    varianza.append(np.var(df[i]))
    desv.append(np.std(df[i]))
print(rango)
print(varianza)
print(desv)
